Audit: Go to the website https://www.adidas.ua/
Click on "subscribe to news"
enter a valid email, select gender and click "Subscribe"
Check if the email arrived
Click the "Confirm Subscription" button in the email
Click on the "Login" button on the main page
Click on the "Register" button on the login page
Enter a valid phone number in the registration field.
Enter a valid code from SMS
Enter a valid code from SMS
Complete registration
Log in with a valid username and password.
On the registration page, try entering spaces instead of numbers.
On the registration page, try entering letters instead of numbers.
On the registration page, try entering an insufficient number of digits in the phone number.
On the registration page, try to enter more digits in the phone number than required.
On the main page, try to find a product called OZWEEGO SNEAKERS
On the main page, try to find a product called SNEAKERS
Check that on the first page of search results all products are SNEAKERS
Check that on the last page with search results all products are SNEAKERS
Check pagination on search results for the word SNEAKERS
Open category MEN'S SHOES FROM ORIGINALS
Click on the "FILTER" button
Sort products by highest price
Sort products by lowest price
Sort products by new arrivals
Sort products by best sellers
Apply price filter 7000-999999
Cancel price filter
Apply filter by size XL
Apply gender filter: female
Check that if no category is selected in Filters, then there is no filter by product type
Check that when a category is selected in Filters, there is a filter by product type
Verify that when Accessories is selected, the following Product Types are available: Headwear, Gloves, Bags and Backpacks, Socks
Check that if no product type is selected in Filters, then there is no filter by product SUBTYPE
Check that when a product type is selected in Filters, there is a filter by product SUBtype
Apply filter by Category, Product Type and Product Subtype
Test data + comments: Category - Accessories, Product Type - Bags and Backpacks, Product Subtype - Backpacks

Audit: Click "Calculate All" in the filter panel
Remove brand filter
Click on the heart icon on the product
Check that the product has been added to the favorites list
Open any product
Check the Gallery, Description and About the model sub-items
Try adding an unavailable size to the cart
Try adding an available size to your cart
Go to checkout
Choose a city
Check that when a user selects a city, specific delivery methods are presented to them
Check that a price has been calculated for each shipping method
Check that when ordering from 2500 UAH, delivery is free
Choose delivery to Post Office
Select branch address (post office)
Enter Latin characters in the first and last name fields
Try not to enter required fields
Fill in all required fields with valid data.
Click "Place order"
Check valid Visa payment
Check for invalid Visa payment
Check payment method Cash on delivery
Cancel order
Click on the Track order button
Enter a valid order ID and email and click "track"
